timeline.bodyText: The @ignore annotation takes a single String parameter. The rule of thumb is to put there a link to the Jira which explains why the test has been ignored and which should be ideally resolved by the author of the test.
timeline.author: rsynek

timeline.message:
JBPM-9246: Ignore random WebSocketKieControllerRuleCapabilitiesIntegrationTest failing test

    - Ignores the following two random failing tests

        WebSocketKieControllerRuleCapabilitiesIntegrationTest.testScanNow
